seoMetadata.metaDescription:
Top Honeymoon Destinations in India for a Romantic Escape

India is a country with a rich legacy. It is filled with historical monuments, temples, beaches, mountains and deserts. It is a country suited for all types of travellers – solo, couple, family or even friends. It has so much to offer, especially to those who are looking for a romantic trip or a place where they can spend their honeymoon. There are countless honeymoon destinations in India to make you celebrate the new phase of your life with your partner.


Booking the right package to your dream honeymoon destination from hundreds of honeymoon packages is tedious and can be difficult. If a trip to an international destination is out of your budget then look at various honeymoon destinations in India. Honeymoon packages in India have plenty of places to offer as per your need. Starting from a romantic boat ride in Dal Lake in Kashmir to the panoramic view of the Indian Ocean in Kanyakumari, from a serene mountain trip in Sikkim to enjoying a camel ride in the Thar desert – there are plenty of honeymoon tour packages available on the internet that offers some amazing places in India for you to visit with your partner. So why travel abroad? Choose from the list of exciting honeymoon packages for the one that doesn’t burn a hole in your pocket. You can travel to amazing honeymoon destinations like Shimla, Dalhousie, Auli, Nainital, Gangtok, Ooty, Coorg and lots more.




Check Honeymoon Packages in India: Honeymoon Packages | Goa Honeymoon Packages | Manali Honeymoon Packages | Kerala Honeymoon Packages | Andaman Honeymoon Packages | Ooty Honeymoon Packages | Shimla Honeymoon Packages | Munnar Honeymoon Packages | Darjeeling Honeymoon Packages | Kashmir Honeymoon Package | Mahabaleshwar Honeymoon Package | Himachal Honeymoon Packages


Check International Honeymoon Packages: International Honeymoon Packages | Maldives Honeymoon Packages | Bali Honeymoon Packages | Mauritius Honeymoon Packages | Singapore Honeymoon Package | Switzerland Honeymoon Package | Thailand Honeymoon Packages | Europe Honeymoon Packages | Dubai Honeymoon Packages | Seychelles Honeymoon Packages | Greece Honeymoon Packages


To help you select the perfect honeymoon destination in India, we are sharing some important tidbits about honeymooning in India that will come in handy for you. We have noted down places you should look for while browsing some of the best honeymoon tour packages available in India. And not only that, but we are also going to share some of the local dishes to try, just so that you can check whether the restaurants or the cities are included in any of the honeymoon packages in India you select. So, come along and continue reading our list of most romantic honeymoon destinations in India, that should be included in the list of honeymoon packages in India.


Best Honeymoon Destinations to Visit in India

  1. Kashmir

Hailed as ‘Paradise on Earth’, Kashmir ranks number one if you are looking for the best honeymoon packages in India. Nestled amid the mighty Himalayas, the picturesque backdrops and pleasant climate of Kashmir are sure to offer you unforgettable experiences. A honeymoon here can range from relaxing in a luxurious retreat to engaging in thrill-seeking adventures. So, why wait? Escape with your better half to one of the best honeymoon destinations that look straight out of a fairytale! Choose from exciting honeymoon packages like the Kashmir honeymoon package, Manali honeymoon package etc and surprise your loved one!


Places to Visit: Gulmarg, Pahalgam, Dal Lake, Sonmarg, Patnitop


Things to do: Shikara ride, Houseboat stay, Gandola ride, Trekking, Skiing


Local Dishes to Try: Paneer Chaman, Mutton Rogan Josh, Kahva, Modur Pulav, Kashmiri Dum Aloo, Khambir


Best Time to Visit: March to June


Ideal Duration of Honeymoon: 5 to 7 days


  1. Goa

Don’t you agree that Goa is on the bucket list of every travel enthusiast? Referred to as the ‘Ibiza of India’, Goa has a slice of paradise for all kinds of people - party lovers, nature lovers, adventure seekers and especially honeymooners. If you are looking for the best honeymoon packages in India, then Goa is all you need! Get romantic with your better half on the sun-drenched sandy beachesor explore exotic cafes and scenic waterfalls. Being quite popular among married couples, Goa has great honeymoon packages for you and your companion. Head to one of the best honeymoon destinations with your beloved and plan your stay at the Luxurious Resorts surrounded by palm-fringed trees and pristine beaches. You can also book honeymoon packages to other beach destinations such as Andaman and grab the best Andaman honeymoon packages.


Places to Visit: Calangute Beach, Fort Agoda, Amboli, Baga Beach, Butterfly Beach


Things to do: Parasailing, Snorkeling, Beach Hopping, Dolphin Watching, Kayaking


Local Dishes to Try: Pork Vindaloo, Prawn Balchao, Goan Red Rice, Kingfish


Best Time to Visit: Mid-November to Mid-February


Ideal Duration of Honeymoon: 6 to 8 days


Check India Tourism Packages: Kerala Tourism | Goa Tourism | Rajasthan Tourism | Sikkim Tourism | Andaman Tourism | Gujarat Tourism | Himachal Pradesh Tourism | Kashmir Tourism | Tourist Places In Coorg | Jaipur Tourism

Check International Tourism Packages: America Tourism | Maldives Tourism | Bhutan Tourism | Dubai Tourism | Nepal Tourism | Bali Tourism | Sri Lanka Tourism | Singapore Tourism | thailand tourism | switzerland tourism


  1. Shimla

Next on the list is the ‘Queen of Hills’, Shimla. As the largest city in Himachal Pradesh, Shimla entices a lot of tourists as it offers views of the majestic mountains and picturesque backdrops. Packed with luxurious hotels and popular tourist attractions, this capital town offers great honeymoon packages for newlyweds. Pick from a wide variety of the best honeymoon tour packages and relish this precious time with your partner. Besides fantastic Shimla honeymoon packages, you can also book a Kashmir honeymoon package and create unforgettable memories with your companion!


Places to Visit:The Ridge, Mall Road, Kufri, Mashobra, Kali Bari Temple


Things to do: Paragliding, Rafting, Mountain Biking, Trekking, Zorbing


Local Dishes to Try: Madra, Dhaam, Sidu, Thukpa, Babru


Best Time to Visit: March to June


Ideal Duration of Honeymoon: 6 to 8 days


Honeymoon packages in India


  1. Kerala

Immerse your soul in the charm of Kerala and plan a romantic getaway with our specially curated honeymoon packages. Also known as ‘God’s Own Country’, Kerela is associated with glassy backwaters, tranquil beaches and patches of land lined with tall coconut trees. Watch the glorious sunrise with your soulmate in the hills of Munnar or stay at a lavish houseboat in Alleppey. Make your Kerala trip memorable and grab the best honeymoon packages in India. If you have already explored Kerala and want to escape to another beach destination, grab the best Lakshadweep honeymoon packages without any wait!


Places to Visit: Munnar, Cochin, Alleppey, Varkala, Thekkady


Things to do: Rafting, Sightseeing, Train Ride, Tea Tasting


Local Dishes to Try: Idiyappam, Erissery, Puttu and Kadala Curry, Ela Sadya


Best Time to Visit: September to March


Ideal Duration of Honeymoon: 6 to 8 days


  1. Manali

Another gorgeous hill station and one of the best honeymoon destinations in Himachal Pradesh is none other than Manali. Located on the banks of Beas River and surrounded by snow-capped mountains, it is the most exquisite place to spend quality time with your wife.


You can book honeymoon packages to Manali and grab the best deals with amazing experiences and stays. And, if you are looking for an equally mesmerizing hill station in the South, you can plan your honeymoon to Ooty! Choose from a wide range of mind-blowing Ooty honeymoon packages and build beautiful memories with your beloved.


Places to Visit: Hadimba Temple, Hampta Pass, Jogini Waterfalls, Solang Valley


Things to do: Paragliding, Rafting, Camping, Hot Air Balloon Ride, Helicopter Ride


Local Dishes to Try: Khatta, Sidu, Babru, Kullu Trout, Patande


Best Time to Visit: September to June


Ideal Duration of Honeymoon: 5 to 7 days


  1. Ooty

Famous for its tea plantations, Ooty offers the most distinguished honeymoon packages in India. Also known as Udhagamandalam, it is located in the state of Tamil Nadu. Lined with serene waterfalls, fascinating tea gardens, charming colonial architecture and winding country lanes, Ooty is the perfect place to rejuvenate and refresh. Considered as one of the best honeymoon packages in India, you are sure to feel closer to your partner on your honeymoon as you soak in the panoramic views of the mountains in Ooty. These honeymoon packages will make your holiday in the hills extra special. If you are a mountain lover, you can also grab the amazing Shimla honeymoon package and marvel at the mountain peaks.


Places to Visit: Avalanche Lake, Ooty Lake, Doddabetta Peak, Kalhatty Waterfalls


Things to do: Train ride to Nilgiri Mountain, Sightseeing at Dolphin’s Nose, Camping at Avalanche Lake, Joyful Boat Ride at the Ooty Lake


Local Dishes to Try: Biryani, Momos, Neer Dosa, Chicken Chettinad, Murukku, Avial


Best Time to Visit: March to June


Ideal Duration of Honeymoon: 5 to 7 days


  1. The Andaman Islands

If you are fond of beaches and tropical forests, then the Andamans isan idealhoneymoon destinationfor you! The islands featureserene palm beaches with spotless stretches of white sands, uninterrupted presence of peace and crystal-clear blue waters all around.Be it a luxury stay or a rejuvenating spa,thesehoneymoon packagesare fully equipped to make your stay memorable.Thehoneymoon tour packagesto Andamans can be customized to suit your needs and cater to your comfort. Indulge in an incredible honeymoon experience in the Andamans and express your love while you admire the splendid sunset. You can also check out other packages like the phenomenalDarjeeling honeymoon packageand plan a special holiday with MakeMyTrip.


Places to Visit: Port Blair, Diglipur, Rangat, Havelock Island, Neil Island


Things to do: Scuba Diving, Snorkeling, Sea Walking, Glass Bottom Boating, Sea Plane Ride


Local Dishes to Try: Fish Curry, Amritsari Kulcha, Chilli Curry, Macher Jhol, Chicken Tikka Masala, Coconut Prawn Curry and Barbeque Food


Best Time to Visit: October to May


Ideal Duration of Honeymoon: 6 to 8 days


  1. Coorg

Located in Karnataka, the magical city of Coorg is popular amongst newlyweds for exciting honeymoon packages. Full of scenic landscapes, modern homestays and a vast range of thrill-seeking activities, Coorg promises an irresistible combination of adventure and fun for couples. Enticed by falling waters and an eye-feasting view of the flora and fauna, it is a trending destination among honeymooners that offers the best honeymoon tour packages. Book from our list of popular honeymoon tour packages like the Kerela honeymoon package and experience a wonderful time with your spouse.


Places to Visit: Madikeri, Somvarpet, Iruppu Falls, Dubare Elephant Camp, Abbey Falls


Things to do: Trekking, Sightseeing at Tala Kaveri, Rock Climbing, Rappelling


Local Dishes to Try: Kadambattu, Pandi Curry, Koli Curry, Kuleputtu


Best Time to Visit: September to March


Ideal Duration of Honeymoon: 5 to 7 days


Check India Tour Packages: Goa Tour Package | Kerala Tour Packages | Tour Packages For Manali | Andaman Tour Packages | Rajasthan Tour Packages | Kashmir Tour Packages | Himachal Tour Packages | Sikkim Tour Packages | Uttarakhand Tour Packages | Darjeeling Tour Packages | Ooty Tour Package | Manali Tour Packages | Ladakh Tour Packages | Holiday Packages

Check International Tour Packages: Maldives Tour Packages | Dubai Tour Packages | Bali Tour Packages | Europe Tour Packages | Singapore Tour Packages | Thailand Tour Packages | Sri Lanka Tour Packages | Bhutan Tour Packages | Nepal Tour Package | Switzerland Tour Packages | Russia Tour Packages | International Holiday Packages


  1. Lakshadweep

Craving for an exotic honeymoon amidst sun-kissed beaches and lush green landscapes? If yes, then the perfect honeymoon destination for newlyweds is Lakshadweep! Dotted with palm trees and clear turquoise waters, the island has everything you can ask for an amazing and memorable honeymoon. Choose from a wide range of Lakshadweep honeymoon tour packages and avail exciting offers. These uniquely curated honeymoon packages will surely make your holiday an enduring experience and provide calm and comfort. Beach lovers, don’t forget to check our Goa honeymoon packages and create spectacular memories that will last you a lifetime.


Places to Visit: Agatti Island, Kadmat Island, Minicoy Island and Kalpeni Beach


Things to do: Scuba Diving, Snorkeling, Canoeing, Fishing and Sunset Watching


Local Dishes to Try: Mus Kavaab, Fish Fry, Maas Podichathu, Batla Appam and Fish Curry.


Best Time to Visit: October to February


Ideal Duration of Honeymoon: 5 to 7 days


  1. Darjeeling

Popularly known as the ‘Abode of God’, Darjeeling is famous for its scenic beauty, ancient forests, quaint houses and panoramic view of the mountains. Feel the love in the air while you marvel at the cloud-kissing hills and peaceful lakes. Inhabited by the people of Tibet, Nepal, nearby Indian states and the Gorkhas, Darjeeling is brimming with cultural diversity. Plan your honeymoon your way by choosing from our highly customizable honeymoon tour packages and create beautiful moments with your partner. Your search for great honeymoon packages in India ends here! Don’t forget to check our amazing honeymoon packages like the Coorg honeymoon package and enjoy romance in the hills.


Places to Visit: Tiger Hill, Mirik, Ghoom Monastery, Senchal Lake, Happy Valley Tea Estate


Things to do: Mountain Biking, Camping, Hiking, River Rafting, Trekking


Local Dishes to Try: Thukpa, Nepali Thali, Naga Cuisine, Churpee, Sael Rotis


Best Time to Visit: April to June


Ideal Duration of Honeymoon: 4 to 5 days

A honeymoon trip is a memorable affair, so make it unique by selecting from the best honeymoon packages available on MakeMyTrip. India is a contrasting and picturesque land, and it caters to the different tastes of all kinds of travellers. To plan an Indian honeymoon is exciting as you can choose from the beautiful and diverse landscapes for a romantic getaway, without going over your budget. From mountains to deserts, islands to beaches, and more, MakeMyTrip honeymoon packages in India are designed to offer you a perfect dream honeymoon. If you want to explore the pristine beaches and unending coastlines then choose from the honeymoon packages of Goa, Andaman or Kerala. And if you love the majestic mountains and snow-clad lofty peaks, then plan to visit Kashmir, Gangtok or Manali from MakeMyTrip honeymoon packages India. Honeymooners who love ancient, historical art and architecture, and the royal grandeur of palaces, can select the Udaipur honeymoon package to spend priceless moments with their better half. The honeymoon packages in India also offer exciting activities for adventure couples, to add some fun and bonding time to your honeymoon. Well-curated,best honeymoon packages are available on MakeMyTrip, so, wait no more! Plan an exclusive, yet pocket-friendly Indian honeymoon with MakeMyTrip and begin the new phase of life with some fun and romance.

seoMetadata.faq:
Ques. What are the top picks for Indian honeymoon packages?

    Ans. There are many destinations that you can choose for honeymoon packages in India. You can opt for popular hill stations like Mussoorie, Kashmir, Shimla, Nainital, Darjeeling, Ooty, Gangtok and Manali. They can be great options for escaping the sweltering summer heat or even for enjoying picturesque winter holidays. If you both love beaches, then you can consider destinations like Goa (which can be visited round the year), Kerala and even Chennai among others. Some other top picks include Rajasthan for its eclectic fusion of history, culture, and architecture and also the Andamans for its gorgeous beaches, stunning views, and exciting water sports activities. India offers a vast canvas in terms of choosing great honeymoon destinations!

    Ques. What is the most convenient time to travel in India?

    Ans. You can check out honeymoon packages for several Indian destinations at different times of the year depending on the weather conditions and your preferences. Most people prefer travelling in the winter season, which is usually between December and March. This is a great time to take in the snow-laced landscapes across popular hill stations or for exploring various historically important destinations. Many honeymooners prefer summer getaways to the mountains for great weather and beach destinations for sun, sand and merriment. Monsoons are not popular picks for most travellers, although some places do come alive in this period with their lush greenery and waterfalls, particularly in the hilly areas.

    Ques. Which budget-friendly destinations can be visited with Indian honeymoon packages?

    Ans. Indian honeymoon packages are available to suit every budget. You can also customise your package as per specific requirements. Some budget-friendly destinations in India include places like Shillong, Guwahati, Goa, Darjeeling, Coorg, Gangtok, Ooty and more. You will find affordable packages available at MakeMyTrip. Check the ones that meet your requirements. You can also consult travel experts for assistance with bookings and itineraries.

    Ques. What are some top historical destinations to visit with an Indian honeymoon package?

    Ans. There are several historical destinations that are available as a part of Indian honeymoon packages. One of the best options is Rajasthan, which is famous for its cultural heritage and majestic forts like the Sonar Qila and Chittorgarh Fort. Explore major cities like Jaipur, Jodhpur, Jaisalmer, Bikaner and Udaipur as part of your package and visit various historical landmarks along the way. Other such options include Mussoorie, which is famous for attractions like the Company Garden, George Everest’s House and many more. Kashmir is another beautiful destination that is steeped in history, offering landmarks like the Shalimar Bagh, Mughal Garden, Pari Mahal and many others. The options are endless, considering India’s diverse historical and cultural legacies over the years.

    Ques. What are the best self-drive destinations for a honeymoon in India?

    Ans. Many couples prefer adding that extra thrill and excitement to their honeymoon packages with self-driving trips. Nothing beats the experience of heading out together by car, andexploring numerous places along the way. India has innumerable destinations which are ideal for self-driving holidays. Some of the top choices include Goa, Manali, Kerala, Rajasthan, Coorg, Nainital, Shillong and Guwahati. These are some locations with amazingly scenic routes and easy accessibility to most landmarks.

    Ques. How is Kerala as a honeymoon destination?

    Ans. The growing popularity of Kerala honeymoon packages is quite natural, considering the state’s beautiful wonders, cultural legacy and delicious cuisine! Kerala is a magical world of pristine backwaters (with houseboat rides) and canals, picture-perfect hill stations, mesmerising beaches, greenery and coconut groves for honeymooners. You can travel to hill stations like Munnar, Thekkady or Wayanad for some refreshing mountain air and stunning natural beauty. Beach lovers can head to places like Kochi, Varkala and Kovalam, which offer tranquillity and relaxation. If you wish to explore the famed backwaters of Kerala, then you can consider destinations like Kumarakom, Alleppey and Kasargod. The state has several enchanting festivals held throughout the year along with lip-smacking local cuisines for guests as well. A honeymoon in Kerala will be an incredibly uplifting experience for any couple.

    Ques. Which beach destinations are recommended for your Indian honeymoon package?

    Ans. Beach lovers have plenty of honeymoon packages to choose from in India. The country has several stretches of coastline, offering fabulous experiences and scenic landscapes to visitors. If you wish to plan an exotic honeymoon amidst sparkling blue waters, then the Andaman Islands are your best bet. Find great beaches here like Swaraj Deep, Elephant Beach, Bharatpur Beach, Kalapathar Beach and more. You can go snorkelling in the Andamans and also participate in other water sports activities. Kerala has several fabulous beach destinations like Kovalam (which is also a sanctuary for Ayurvedic and wellness treatments), Varkala and Alappuzha. For charming landscapes, fun-filled beaches, shopping, delicious food and partying, look no further than Goa. The sunshine state has several destinations worth visiting including Calangute, Candolim, Vagator, Anjuna, Palolem, Miramar, Panjim and more. You will find some of the country’s cleanest beaches in Goa.

    Ques. What are the top places to explore in Goa for your honeymoon?

    Ans. When it comes to Goa honeymoon packages, there is a lot that you can check out in a few days. Goa is famous for a multitude of attractions and you cannot expect to cover them all in a single trip. North Goa is home to many famous beaches and other attractions. South Goa is more private, secluded and relaxed. You will find many pristine beaches in this part of the state. Panjim is where you can visit attractions like the Immaculate Conception Church, Miramar Beach and the quaint Latin Quarters. Other must-visit destinations in Goa include beaches like Anjuna, Baga, Calangute, Candolim and Vagator. You can also check out relatively quieter places like Benaulim, Palolem and others. Dona Paula is another great place to visit in Goa along with the iconic Aguada Fort.

    Ques. What are some of the most romantic places to visit in Kashmir?

    Ans. Kashmir honeymoon packages offer an exciting opportunity to witness Heaven on Earth in all its splendour. Some of the most romantic places in Kashmir include the Dal Lake, where you can take an ethereal Shikara ride during sunset. Srinagar also has other romantic attractions like the historic Mughal Gardens which is ideal for romantic walks with a spectacular backdrop. Pahalgam will leave honeymooners enthralled with its stunning landscapes. A trek to the Kohli Glacier and white water rafting on the Lidder River in Pahalgam are ideal activities for adrenaline junkies. If you’re visiting in winter, then Gulmarg is undoubtedly one of the most romantic destinations to explore in Kashmir. Go skiing in Gulmarg or simply spend memorable moments at the Gulmarg Gondola.

    Ques. Where should you plan your honeymoon in Northeast India?

    Ans. Northeast India honeymoon packages offer a plethora of options for couples. You can travel to captivating hill stations like Gangtok and Darjeeling on your trip. You can also check out Shillong, which is regarded as the Scotland of the East. Shillong offers gorgeous waterfalls, majestic mountain landscapes and plenty of hidden wonders. You can easily travel to Cherrapunjee from here. Guwahati is a beautiful city in Assam which is a short distance away from Shillong. You can visit several famous temples and other landmarks here. Want the ultimate romantic experience? Go on a boat ride on the Brahmaputra River in Guwahati. Northeast India is filled with endless opportunities with special experiences for honeymooners!
